data.Name: Carrypicker
data.Tagline: Carrypicker makes transport easier and more economical, always finding the best carrier and the smartest way to your customers.
data.About:
The disposition of goods in transit is a highly complex process. Numerous, constantly changing influencing factors lead to millions of options with just a few orders, making profitable charge optimization even for experienced dispatchers almost impossible.

Carrypicker calculates the best solution in a matter of seconds using high-performance computers and intelligent algorithms - faster and more accurately than any human.

The result is a next-generation freight forwarding company for the benefit of customers, hauliers and the environment.
